short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate daily hydrogen water intake based on weight, age, and H2 concentration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple calculator that helps you determine your optimal daily hydrogen water intake. Enter your age, weight, and hydrogen water device to receive personalized recommendations. Perfect for health-conscious individuals using Ocemida or other hydrogen water systems.
Features:

Easy-to-use calculator interface
Personalized intake recommendations
Support for different hydrogen water devices
Weight and age-based calculations
Quick reference for daily hydration goals

Stay properly hydrated with scientifically-informed recommendations tailored to your needs.
